#api_token.title: API Key
#api_token.description: API key generated in Deepnote, described in the documentation

project_id.title: Project id
project_id.description: ID of the project in which the notebook is. The ID can be obtained via the URL path to the notebook, described in the documentation

notebook_id.title: Notebook id
notebook_id.description: The ID of the Notebook to be run, which can be obtained via the URL path to the notebook, described in the documentation
